text: Clifford the Big Red Dog might refer to: *Clifford the Big Red Dog (book series), a series of children's books by Norman Bridwell ==TV== *Clifford the Big Red Dog (2000 TV series), 2000 animated TV series *Clifford's Puppy Days, 2003 animated TV series *Clifford the Big Red Dog (2019 TV series), 2019 animated TV series ==Movies== *Clifford's Really Big Movie, 2004 animated movie *Clifford the Big Red Dog (movie), 2021 animated movie
title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
